p.span:
“All public schools close for students effective Monday, March 16, 2020, as set forth in Executive Order No. 117, through Friday, May 15 , 2020 ,
unless extended beyond that date.” Issued by the North Carolina State Board of Education and Department of Public Instruction

strong.em: If you are experiencing computer or an application error click on the button below to send an email

span.strong:
to the HELP DESK staff.
Please be sure to include the following information;

strong.em: Along with a brief but thorough description of the problem.

strong.strong: We will contact you back as quickly as possible.

a.title: Please remember to add Magellan userid, contact phone number, and problem description

span.strong: A Challenging Intellectual Journey for Highly Motivated Learners

div.p: Welcome to the Magellan Charter School website! Please look through these pages to see how we deliver academic excellence for highly motivated learners with inspirational teaching, innovative educators and engaged parent volunteers. Join us as we chart a rich experience for our students!
